category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMBOMAssessmentRepairDefaultSearchCriteria
preference.preference_description: List of criteria values that will be used by searching repair candidates in the MBOM Assessment Repair View. Each criteria value describes a BOMLine property which will be taken into account by the search. It is a comma separated string. For one criteria value string, the format is defined as follows: Part 1: either Mandatory or Optional Part 2: internal BOMLine property name Part 3: operator, currently only "=" is supported. Part 4: value type, currently only "string" type is supported.
